backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing admin email/password auth, session handling, and CRUD storage for portfolio data with mixin-based authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files to logout-loading and session-hook enhancements with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across components, hooks, pages, and layouts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration defining all public and admin routes and wrapping the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user without admin access attempts to view admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminEmailL: Email/password admin login form handling credential submission, error states, and redirecting after successful login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading indicators and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/controls/DarkMod: Button allowing users to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
Animates typing and deleting a list of words, with reduced‑motion support and stable layout width.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Provides the admin dashboard shell with auth guard, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Wraps public pages with a navbar, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Displays the public navigation bar with responsive mobile menu and dark‑mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Shows a project card with image, description, technologies, and links to demo or GitHub.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Returns admin authentication status for protecting admin routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting admin‑managed entities with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Fetches admin data such as contact messages and the caller's user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session state using shared token storage, validates sessions, and provides login/logout mutations with react-query.
Handles submitting contact messages through the actor API and invalidates related queries with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSeed.ts: Initializes seed data when caller is admin and triggers cache invalidation after running once.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioQueries.t: Exposes react-query hooks to fetch portfolio data including about, skills, projects, experiences, and social links.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility/component styles including animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About section, fetching about content and showing loading skeletons and profile info.
Admin interface to view and edit About page content using a form and update mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin overview page listing management sections with icons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExperience: Admin CRUD interface for managing experience entries with dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Admin view for reading, marking, and deleting contact form messages sorted by date.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProjectsPa: Admin UI page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting portfolio projects using dialogs and form state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSkillsPage: Admin page for managing skills with CRUD operations, form dialogs, and category/level selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialLink: Admin CRUD interface for managing social media links with dialogs and table display.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation, submits messages, and lists social links with icons.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Shows a timeline of work experiences with loading skeletons and detailed experience cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, animated typing titles, and quick navigation links to major site sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays portfolio projects with loading skeletons and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Loads skills, groups them by category, and displays them in structured cards with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/adminRedirect.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing intended admin redirect paths in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: File storing project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and known issues.
